description:
Chat with real people & find new people. Relations based socialization. Take pics & share with others.

Tubri is a new kind of social network based on real-life relations which lets you socialize with different type of people differently.

It lets you create labels like: My Family, My Friends & My co-workers etc. and assign them to your people. These labels are private and nobody knows which labels you assigned them to.

Labels let you share different photos/discuss different things with different type of people.

eg: A photo shared with "My Friends" will not be visible to people in "My Family" and others.

A rapidly growing social network, Tubri lets you enjoy better control on your social life.

Learn more at www.tubri.com
